channel.title: Help me get my account back!
channel.description:
Hey! Its RuneWings317 here. I have been hacked by Owner Nitro. He got mad cause I kicked him out of a development. He can give but he can't take. I don't know if any of you recall, but I used to be in Dub-PK, he kicked me out. I didn't get pissed at him. Well looky here... So I'm using my brothers account (this is my username on other servers, but he got pissed at me one day and made this account, thinking it would make me mad xD).
So heres some proof. #1. I saw that you keep a record of IPs. Check them out, you will see one of them is completely different.
#2. This image, and as many of you know his name is Zak: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/proof.PNG[/img]
#3. I have emails stored into my account I registered with. Some of those people know who they are, such as I_Hybrid_I with his SantaX banner. He knows about that, so I'm asking please vouch!
#4. These vouches that are commenting below :)
Thank-you MoparScape and please know, that he is a fraud! If you want more proof, add me on MSN, xldarkwinglx@hotmail.com.

[quote author=rant link=topic=497811.msg3640549#msg3640549 date=1308966131]
da fuck kind of guy hacks a low-profile like you? this is just sad, i say let the guy have the account. This dude obv doesn’t need it back if he goes around giving out his passwords or letting random people join his “developments”
[/quote]Erm… Its not this account… And I didn’t give out my password. And Owner Nitro is desperate for exceptance cause he has the most shitty reputation as it is (not as in points). I have a fairly decent reputation so he just took my account.

This is him :3
[/quote]Thanks

sorry if im being ignorant but how’d he get your account? any idea?[/quote]My fucking character file…

item.description:
@xldarkwinglx wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:6, topic:400755”]“have fun with no mopar”

laughed. If thats the most someone can come up with, they need to get a life, since most insults generally reflect how the person views it (except get a life and faggot, they are too general to really mean anything).

i’ll vouch for you, although its better to pm a staff member.[/quote]Loveandpower did it (on request) and so did pk2play (not on request, by his own free will). No replies. Hoping this will get some attention. I don’t even give a fuck if they ban runewings317 I just don’t want anyone having the account >.<
